title: Communication in Monetary Policy
content: For release on delivery  5:00 p.m. EDT  April 4, 2013      Communication in Monetary Policy         Remarks by     Janet L. Yellen     Vice Chair     Board of Governors of the Federal Reserve System     at     Society of American Business Editors and Writers  50th Anniversary Conference     Washington, D.C.    April 4, 2013
